description:
T1 Maple - Pruning - Re-pollard back to previous reduction points - 2m crown height reduction and a 2m crown spread reduction leaving a final height of 10m and a final crown spread of 5.0m
T2 Honey Locust - Fell and treat stump with eco plugs (broadleaved).
T3 Honey Locust - Pruning - Pollard back to previous reduction points - 4m crown height reduction and 5m crown spread reduction leaving a final height of 10m and a final crown spread of 6m

- TO COMBAT SUBSIDENCE DAMAGE
decision_conditions: The specification is not suitable and therefore needs to be confirmed. The specification needs to be measurable and quantifiable so that we can understand the amount that is to be removed in meters. We need to know the amount to be removed and the remaining crown size. E.g. 2m crown reduction in width and 2m reduction in height, leaving a canopy spread of 3m and height of 5m
